transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan mam ab bataiye kya keh rahi thi.
Customer: Ji good morning kaise hain sir aap?
Executive: Badhiya hai aap apna bataiye.
Customer: Main bhi achi hu sir. Theek hai. Sir mujhe janna tha kya problem aa rahi hai profile pe?
Executive: Bataya to tha kal usi cheez
Customer: Kal meri kaha aap se baat kaha aap se baat ho payegi aapne bola tha baad mein baat karunga.
Executive: Achcha haan. Are wahi location ke liye kal raat mein hui to thi baat sham time.
Customer: Hmm. Location jis location pe mujhe leads chahiye thi us location pe nahi mil rahi thi.
Executive: Achcha location location ka hai. To haan ek second sir aap keh rahe the in location se aapko lead chahiye. Theek hai. Haan. Theek hai. Ye maine shuruat mein lene se pehle bhi maine mention kiya tha. Haan abhi theek hai abhi aapne 15 November se hi aapki listing hui hai company ki. Sir main kuch cheeze aapko batati hu ki kis hisab se kaam kariye to aapko is location se lead aana shuru ho jayegi. Theek hai. Sir dekho ye artificial system hai. Theek hai isko aapko abhi pehle ye naya hai account sir to usko aapko customize karne padega apne hisab se. Theek hai ki mujhe in sab area se hi aap lead do aur kisi area ke mujhe lead mat do. Theek hai. To wo mujhe karna chahiye. Haan bataiye kya keh rahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Ab sir dekhiye in jo areas hai ab by lead jo consume karte hain sabse pehle ye kariye sir ye jo area hai unki aap lead filter karke utha aap filter karke uthate ho lead kaise uthate ho sir lead abhi aap? Jo normal leads aa rahi hai main leads pe ye by leads pe chala jata hu. Haan. To jo leads aati hai jaise aaj ek aayi hai Hardoi ki. Theek hai. Hmm hmm. Theek hai. Hardoi mein yaha pe main dekh rahi hu mention aap Hardoi mein to karte hain business. Theek hai. Haan maine Hardoi okay bhi kar. Haan. Ab sir dekho main batati hu aise kariye ga sir ki aap apne product ka search mariye. Theek hai. Roz aap search kariye ga aur sir usme jo aap jo filter mein dekhiye waha pe jo location ka filter hai na sir waha pe apna jo area hai sir. Theek hai. Usme aap Lucknow jo bhi aapke area hai usko daliye ga sir. Theek hai. Aur waha ki lead consume karna shuru kariye. Theek hai. Sir automatically ek hafte ke andar aapko jis jis area se aap lead uthana shuru kar rahe ho sir us area se aapka preferred ban jayega. Matlab ki ye system ko pata chal jayega ki is client ko is area se hi is chahiye by lead. To wo fir aapko next ek hafte ke andar fir aapko sirf usi area se jo lead generate hogi sir wo aapko dikhana shuru kar dega. Abhi sir aapko isliye nahi aa rahi kyuki abhi sir aapka account bana hua hai naya. Theek hai. Online mein sir ek cheez hoti hai ki ek bar customize kar diya na apne hisab se ki mujhe is is area se chahiye to life long sir jab tak aap hamare sath ho aapko bas usi area se hi lead milegi. Theek hai. Pehli cheez sir aapko samajh aaya clarity mili sir? Haan haan samajh aaya. Haan. Theek hai. Dusri cheez sir but fir bhi fir bhi hame show jaise idhar ke areas ke jyada show hi nahi hote. Sir hogi sir abhi aapka account ekdam new hai sir. Okay. Theek hai. Thoda time lagta hai sir build up hone mein catalog ko aapka listing to ho gayi company ki bas jis jis area chahiye usme aapko leads uthana padega sir tab jaake usi usi area se aapko lead uthana aane shuru ho jayegi. Abhi aap koi filter nahi laga rahe the abhi aapko jo dikh raha tha aap usme se utha le rahe the aapko lag raha tha wo sab area se to aati hi nahi hai lead. Theek hai. Pehli cheez sir ye. Dusri cheez sir dekhiye isiliye humne waha pe na bahut sare filter ka option diya hua hai. Sir aapko dekhiye in area se karna hai kuch log hote hain jinko pan India se karna hota hai kuch log hote hain jo south se karna hota hai. Theek hai. To humne isiliye filter diya hua hai ki sir aap apne hisab se filter laga ke un area se lead uthana shuru kariye. Theek hai. Isme thoda sa time lagta hai sir hafta do hafta lagta hai acche se proper aane mein sir. Theek hai. Dusri cheez sir kabhi bhi agar kisi galat area se aa rahi hai man lijiye ki Kerala se aa rahi hai example de rahi hu sir. Theek hai. To agar Kerala ki lead dikha rahi hai to waha pe ek dustbin ka icon aata hai sir. Theek hai. Us dustbin ka icon aapne dekha hai sir dustbin ka icon usme haan haan haan. Haan us pe click karke kar dijiyega I don't deal in this area. Theek hai. Okay. To hamara jo AI system hai sir uske paas ye message chala jayega ki sir ko ye jo aapki company hai Grassti interior construction isko is area se Kerala se lead nahi chahiye to mat hame provide karo. Theek hai. Aur ek cheez aur jaise construction construction pe bhi hum work karte hain to construction ki abhi ek aur leads nahi aa rahi hai. Aayegi sir abhi kya kariye ek to area ka filter laga ke dekhiye. Dusra sir product ka aapka jis product mein sir karte ho aap. Theek hai. Un product mein bhi aap search karna un product ka naam jo upar search bar aata hai na sir us search bar mein aap dalo ki mujhe is jaise aapne construction ka dala aap search karo theek hai ek do lead dikhegi sir theek hai unko consume kariye to fir us system ko chala jayega ki achcha inko construction mein bhi chahiye. Sir dekho main batati hu aap naye ho thoda sa aapko starting mein initially ek month matlab is month mein aapko apne ye jo system hai usko apne hisab se customize karna padega tab jaake aap life long aapko usi area ki aur usi product ki fir lead aana shuru ho jayegi. Okay mam. Haan to un area se aap lead abhi aap filter lagaiye sir sir filter bahut acche acche hai usme GST ka filter bhi hai sir wo filter lagaya kariye ki samne wala aapko pata chale kya hoga. Usse sir jo GST jo khud businessman hai sir unka aapko dikhega ki ye GST verified customer hai. Theek hai nahi to minimum koshish kiya kariye sir business ka filter jarur lagaiye. Theek hai ab dekhiye sir aapka jo jaise aap jisme deal karte hain usme logo ka email mobile verified bhi hota hai na sir jaruri nahi hota ye thoda sa hit and wali wali baat hoti hai hit and strike wali baat hoti hai sir ki starting mein aapko lead acche se uthana padega dekhna padega ki achcha agar main aisi lead utha raha hu to kya response aa raha hai kyuki sir hamare na karodo lead roz aa rahi hai profile pe theek hai to hame usko filter karna padega apne hisab se aur samajhna padega ki ye ye lead hum uthayenge to isse hame ye response mil raha hai theek hai. To aise sir abhi aapko starting mein lead uthana padega thoda sa sir aap ek do is week mein aur aane wale week mein acche se lead uthaiye kahi bhi problem hoti hai aapka account manager ka number main share kar deti hu aapko aap unse baat kar lijiyega sir aur wo aapko weekly follow up kar lenge kahi bhi problem aata hai kuch bhi aata hai lead ka to wo aapko bata denge sir. Theek hai. To aap isi number pe account number wo jo lead jo hamara manager rahega uska number aap forward kar dijiye. Main aapke manager main aapke manager jo hai na account manager unse bol deti hu aapko whatsapp kar de theek hai to aap direct unko hi call kar lijiyega main unki manager baat kar rahi hu. To aap hamare lead manager hongi. Nahi main aapke main unki manager baat kar rahi hu jo aapke account manager hai main unse bol dungi aap se ek bar follow up monday ko le le lead ka theek hai koi bhi problem sir agar India mart se koi bhi aapko dikkat aa raha hai kuch bhi aayega aap direct apne account manager ko whatsapp kar dijiyega to wo aapko call kar lenge agar available nahi hongi whatsapp pe reply kar denge agar agar hoga to wo aapko call kar lenge usi time pe. Okay. Theek hai. To direct aap unko bolenge ki sir kya hota hai ki aap 9696 ya mail pe aap reply karte hain to fir thoda matlab time lag jata hai hame reply karne mein aapko to pata chala aapka fir issue resolve us time tak hona to direct account manager ko call kariye wo instantly aapka problem solve kar denge. Chaliye theek hai. Theek hai sir aapka na sir aapne mail kar diya tha to wo customer care pe chala gaya tha main isko close karti hu sir aap please feedback mein hame yes aur kuch achcha comment de dijiyega sir. Okay okay. Theek hai. Okay mam. Okay thank you so much sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads from desired locations.

- Construction leads not coming.



Resolution:

- Explained how to customize lead preferences.

- Advised using filters for area and product.

- Suggested using the dustbin icon for irrelevant leads.

- Advised to contact account manager for issues.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will contact the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, filters, customization, account manager
